Westside Shuttle

WS Outbound Description:

The Westside Outbound leaves campus and travels through Floral Avenue in Johnson City and Main Street in Binghamton enroute to the University Downtown Center.


WS Inbound Description:

The Westside Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center and travels through Main Street in Binghamton and Floral Avenue in Johnson City enroute to campus.


Reminder: All Inbound buses at the University Downtown Center return to campus.

WS Outbound

with service to:

• Floral Avenue in Johnson City

• Main Street in Binghamton

• University Downtown Center in Downtown Binghamton

WS Inbound

with service to:

• Main Street in Binghamton

• Floral Avenue in Johnson City

• Binghamton University

Late Nite Westside Shuttle

Late Nite WS Outbound Description:

The Late Nite Westside Outbound leaves campus and travels through Floral Avenue in Johnson City and Main Street in Binghamton enroute to Downtown Binghamton - State & Hawley Streets.


Reminder: The Late Nite WS Outbound ONLY operates on Friday and Saturday nights from 12:045 A.M. to 3:15 A.M, unless otherwise posted.


Late Nite WS Inbound Description:

The Late Nite Westside Inbound leaves Downtown Binghamton - State & Hawley Streets and travels through Main Street in Binghamton and Floral Avenue in Johnson City enroute to campus.


Reminder: The Late Nite WS Inbound ONLY operates on Friday and Saturday nights from 12:45 A.M. to 3:25 A.M, unless otherwise posted.

Late Nite

WS Outbound

with service to:

• Floral Avenue in Johnson City

• Main Street in Binghamton

• State & Hawley Streets in Downtown Binghamton

Late Nite

WS Inbound

with service to:

• Main Street in Binghamton

• Floral Avenue in Johnson City

• Binghamton University
